profileSummary: Full-Stack Engineer with over 8 years of experience building scalable web applications and data-intensive platforms. As Co-Founder of baito, Germany's leading impact job board for sustainable and social employment, I have direct experience in the sustainability sector. My technical expertise spans TypeScript, React, Next.js, and PostgreSQL, with a focus on building performant user interfaces and robust backend systems. I take ownership of key components and contribute to architectural decisions, delivering outcome-oriented solutions from concept to deployment.

workExperience.title: Co-Founder & Full-Stack Engineer
workExperience.description: Impact Job Board for Sustainable Employment – getbaito.com, jobscouts.io & talentalert.io
achievements: Architected and built the entire platform using Next.js, TypeScript, tRPC, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
Designed data-intensive tools processing 7M+ user events monthly and crawling 10k career pages.
Built performant frontend components with React, Tailwind CSS, and component-based UI architecture.
Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated external data sources for job aggregation.
Developed state management patterns and optimized application performance for scale.
Shipped features end-to-end with full ownership: from product specs to production deployment.
Built background job processing with BullMQ for async workflows and data pipelines.

workExperience.title: Product-Builder & Full-Stack Developer
achievements: Built approximately 25 web products from scratch, handling full-stack development autonomously.
Developed frontend systems with Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Created backend systems with Node.js, Express.js, REST APIs, GraphQL, and Prisma.
Managed complete product lifecycle from concept through deployment and iteration.

workExperience.title: Frontend Developer
achievements: Built modern web applications using React Native, Vue.js, and microservices architecture.
Integrated RESTful APIs and collaborated closely with backend engineering teams.
Delivered projects from wireframes and prototypes to production in agile SCRUM environment.

workExperience.title: Frontend Developer
achievements: Integrated real-time messaging features with WebSockets.
Applied test-driven development practices with Mocha.js.
Created design mockups and collaborated on product iterations.
